mapper.sql: t.id as t_id, t.unitproject_id as t_unitproject_id, t.code as t_code, t.type as t_type, t.name as t_name, t.type_info as t_type_info, t.unit as t_unit, t.content as t_content, t.single_price as t_single_price, t.Market_price as t_Market_price, t.amount as t_amount, t.orig_count as t_orig_count
mapper.insert: insert into tm_unitproject_detail (id, unitproject_id, code, type, name, type_info, unit, content, single_price, Market_price, amount, orig_count ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{unitprojectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{singlePrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{marketPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{amount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{origCount,jdbcType=DOUBLE} )
mapper.update: update tm_unitproject_detail set unitproject_id = #{unitprojectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type_info = #{typeInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, single_price = #{singlePrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Market_price = #{marketPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, orig_count = #{origCount,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
